title: FS: PC796 Tris Speaker PSA 4 *highest graded
author: ajjohnsonsoxfan

posts.post_title: FS: PC796 Tris Speaker PSA 4 *highest graded
posts.post_content:
Hey y'all Speaker fans out there.  Here's a super night PSA 4 PC796 Speaker.  Only two total examples graded by PSA and 12 by SGC.  Only 1 graded a 4 (none higher) by SGC and 1 by PSA (none higher)

$8k (cash or will consider trades for 1914 CJ's)
One of my favorite cards, congrats to the new owner.
Very nice card and fetched a big price in my opinion.
